channel.title: strategy on Rizwan Hasan
channel.description: Recent content in strategy on Rizwan Hasan

item.title: Philosophy of Taking Hard Decisions
item.description: Sometimes you have to take hard decisions. You may don’t want to take it and be upset about that. Don’t be upset. All the pain, upsetness you’re feeling is temporary. But this temporary pain can become a boost up for starting with a new strategy in long run. You need to leave something in order to get new. It may sound cruel but it’s the reality.

item.title: Philosophy of Losers
item.description: Losers never give up on giving excuses because they have a strong belief in themselves that they can’t do it. It’s your beliefs that make you the winner or loser in the first place.
